short_summary: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to procure Temporary Help Services in Northern Alberta through a standing offer process.
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to procure Temporary Help Services in Northern Alberta through a standing offer process. The contractor will provide temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in the geographical Areas listed in Annex "A" Statement of Work, on an as and when requested basis. The Standing Offers will be awarded to qualified Offerors, and the expected contract duration is 6 months (December 1, 2023 to May 31, 2024), with an option to extend for an additional year.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking Standing Offers for the provision of temporary help services to federal government departments and agencies in the Edmonton region on an as-needed basis. This Request for Standing Offer (RSO) aims to establish multiple Standing Offers with qualified Offerors.

## Key Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4283466387
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: November 17, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **procurement Methods**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **selection criteria**: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* **Region of Operation**: Edmonton
* **Period of Contract**: December 1, 2023 to May 31, 2024, with the option to extend for one additional year
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Voluntary Set-Aside**: Available for Aboriginal Business

## Supporting Documents and Bid Submission

Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions to PSTC/PSPC by the deadline. Make sure to disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Andrew Hemy (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: andrew.hemy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17881857?extsite=MTc4ODE4NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The above changes and rephrasing should accurately reflect the information provided by the original text while improving its clarity and readability.  The AWS documentation is an official government document and I have made the following changes:
- Used section titles to provide a clear summary
- Removed redundant or unnecessary information
- Standardized formatting and styled text using Markdown
- Rewrite in a way that is clear and concise while capturing all information required for the reader to submit an RSO for the call.



# What do I do with this output?
